content: Ibaslogic was developed by Ibas Majid, a self-taught web developer, technical writer and advocate of project-based learning. Ibas teaches JavaScript, React, GraphQL, Gatsby and WordPress theme development. And he has helped companies of different sizes grow their businesses by providing dev solutions.

Ibas is open to freelance Gig. So go ahead and get in touch if you want a responsive website/apps that scale gracefully on all devices or a well-written technical content (articles and eBooks) for your marketing strategy or whatever reasons.
You can drop him a note at ibas@ibaslogic.com or find him on Twitter @ibaslogic.
